DataElement.preferredName: Pediatric Quality of Life Inventory Version 4 Child Self-Report Psychosocial Health Summary Score Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the sum of the items over the number of items answered in the Emotional, Social, and School Functioning Scales in the Pediatric Quality of Life Inventory Version 4, Child Self-Report form.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pediatric Quality of Life Inventory, Version 4 PedsQL-4 Child Report Psychosocial Health Summary Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A modular instrument for measuring health-related quality of life in children and adolescents ages 2 to 18. The PedsQL combines both generic core scales and disease-specific modules._A self-report questionnaire that assesses health-related quality of life in children and adolescents ages 8 to 12._The mean value computed as the sum of the score of individual items over the number of items answered in the Emotional, Social, and School Functioning Scales.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Pediatric Quality of Life Inventory, Version 4
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A modular instrument for measuring health-related quality of life in children and adolescents ages 2 to 18. The PedsQL combines both generic core scales and disease-specific modules.

The mean value computed as the sum of the score of individual items over the number of items answered in the Emotional, Social, and School Functioning Scales.
